songs.title: Believe It
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus: Rihanna & PARTYNEXTDOOR]
Babe
Best make me believe it (Best make me be-)
Best make me believe it
Believe you won't deceive me
Babe
Best make me believe it (Best make me be-)
Best make me believe it
Believe you won't deceive me

[Verse 1: PARTYNEXTDOOR]
First you gotta forgive me
Let me know everything gon' be okay
And if I come back with everything I did
Would you still punish me? You know I did a long time ago
If so, let me know
If I propose, would you say no?
Would you break my heart?
Would you embarrass me or play your part?
Baby, don't fall, my heart is yours
You got the power, pussy power
You got the power, pussy power
The floor is yours, the time ours
Hey, you believe it or you don't?
Choose to you believe in who you want
If you leave me I'm skull and bones and dead, baby
It's on me—

[Chorus: Rihanna & PARTYNEXTDOOR]
Babe (You)
Best make me believe it (Best make me be-)
Best make me believe it
Believe you won't deceive me
Babe (Babe, oh)
Best make me believe it (Best make me be-)
Best make me believe it (Hey oh)
Believe you won't deceive me (Hey oh)

[Verse 2: PARTYNEXTDOOR]
Babe
You told me that you'd kill me if I fuck around
You told me I'm a lucky motherfucka
You love 'em but you never ever trust 'em
You never ever trust me, no more
There's two sides to the story
And that girl got a good PR
I know you never leave your phone
Because I like my bitches [?]
Ooh woah
Tell me you love me 'cause I know they won't
They want to fit in for the photoshoot
Put down my sign baby, I notice you
Lame niggas hate, baby, they acting new
My family like you, yeah, they liking you
My momma whatsapp and she skype you
She wanna know why [?]
You say "either way"
You know you—

[Chorus: Rihanna & PARTYNEXTDOOR]
Babe (You)
Best make me believe it (Best make me be-)
Best make me believe it
Believe you won't deceive me
Babe (Babe, oh)
Best make me believe it (Best make me be-)
Best make me believe it (You woah)
Believe you won't deceive me (Oh yeah, oh)
Yeah
